## Site Overview

**Name:** Mortgage Calculator Quest
**URL:** https://mortgagecalculator.quest
**Type:** Financial calculator and educational resource
**Market:** United Kingdom
**Language:** British English (en-GB)

## Purpose

Mortgage Calculator Quest provides free, accurate mortgage calculators and educational content for UK homebuyers, property investors, and existing homeowners. Our tools help users:

- Calculate monthly mortgage repayments
- Estimate stamp duty land tax (SDLT)
- Assess mortgage affordability
- Analyse overpayment savings
- Evaluate buy-to-let investments
- Compare mortgage scenarios

## UK-Specific Information

### Current Data (January 2025)
- Bank of England Base Rate: 4.50%
- Average 2-year fixed rate: 4.5% (75% LTV)
- Average 5-year fixed rate: 4.3% (75% LTV)
- First-time buyer stamp duty threshold: £425,000
- Standard stamp duty threshold: £250,000
- Additional property surcharge: 3%

### Stamp Duty Rates (England & Northern Ireland)
| Band | Standard Rate | First-Time Buyer |
|------|--------------|------------------|
| £0 - £250,000 | 0% | 0% (up to £425,000) |
| £250,001 - £925,000 | 5% | 5% (£425,001 - £625,000) |
| £925,001 - £1,500,000 | 10% | Standard rates |
| Over £1,500,000 | 12% | Standard rates |

### Typical Lending Criteria
- Income multiple: 4-4.5x annual salary
- Minimum deposit: 5-10% (25% for buy-to-let)
- Maximum term: 35-40 years
- Interest coverage ratio (BTL): 125-145%
